tool.name: anvi-upgrade
tool.description: Download and install minor releases of anvi'o from a Github repository.

param.name: repository
param.label: Repository
param.help: Source repository to download releases, currently only Github is supported. Enter in 'merenlab/anvio' format.

tool.help:
usage: anvi-upgrade [-h] [--repository REPOSITORY]
Download and install minor releases of anvi'o from a Github repository.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --repository REPOSITORY Source repository to download releases, currently only Github is supported. Enter in 'merenlab/anvio' format.
